member.name: T:SwitchDevices.CoolantSystemStatus
member.summary: Status of coolant system enumeration Check indicates a manual check needs to be performed by the operator

member.name: M:SwitchDevices.Switch.DisconnectPowerGenerator
member.summary: Disconnect from the external power generation systems
member.exception: Thrown when the physical switch cannot establish a connection to the power generation system

member.name: M:SwitchDevices.Switch.VerifyPrimaryCoolantSystem
member.summary: Runs a diagnostic check against the primary coolant system
member.exception: Thrown when the switch cannot read the temperature from the coolant system
Thrown when the switch cannot read the pressure from the coolant system

member.name: M:SwitchDevices.Switch.VerifyBackupCoolantSystem
member.summary: Runs a diagnostic check against the backup coolant system
member.exception: Thrown when the switch cannot read the temperature from the coolant system
Thrown when the switch cannot read the pressure from the coolant system

member.name: M:SwitchDevices.Switch.GetCoreTemperature
member.summary: Reads the temperature from the reactor core
member.exception: Thrown when the switch cannot access the temperature data

member.name: M:SwitchDevices.Switch.InsertRodCluster
member.summary: Instructs the reactor to insert the control rods to shut the reactor down
member.exception: Thrown if the switch device cannot read the rod position

member.name: M:SwitchDevices.Switch.GetRadiationLevel
member.summary: Reads the radiation level from the reactor core
member.exception: Thrown when the switch cannot access the radiation level data

member.name: M:SwitchDevices.Switch.SignalShutdownComplete
member.summary: Sends a broadcast message to PA system notofying shutdown complete
member.exception: Thrown if the switch cannot connect to the PA system over the network

member.name: T:SwitchDevices.Switch
member.summary: Switch class - manages interaction with physical switch hardware
